Html:
Hi there, I've been using Caliburn earlier, where the ActionMessage allowed me to have multiple parameters passed to the "command delegates". 
Is it possible to use multiple parameters in this framework? Say the selectedItem of two controls?

One way to achieve your reqirement is to use multibinding for command parameter
